33  from tdi import util as _util 
34  from tdi._exceptions import * # pylint: disable = W0401, W0614, W0622 
35  from tdi.markup import factory as _factory 
36   
37  #: Version of the TDI package 
38  #: 
39  #: :Type: `tdi.util.Version` 
40  version = _util.Version(*__version__) 
41   
42  #: HTML Template factory 
43  #: 
44  #: :Type: `tdi.factory.Factory` 
45  html = _factory.html 
46   
47  #: XML Template factory 
48  #: 
49  #: :Type: `tdi.factory.Factory` 
50  xml = _factory.xml 
51   
52  #: Text Template factory 
53  #: 
54  #: :Type: `tdi.factory.Factory` 
55  text = _factory.text 
56   
57  __all__ = _util.find_public(globals()) 
58  del _util, _factory 
59   
60  from tdi import _deprecations # pylint: disable = W0611
